bibl.title: The Cult of Saint Thecla: A Tradition of Women's Piety in Late Antiquity. (Oxford Early Christian Studies.)
bibl.note: Focuses his attention specifically on the cult of Saint Thecla in Asia Minor and Egypt. Brings the evidence together in order to reconstruct the Egyptian cult of Saint Thecla.
bibl.seg: DAVIS Stephen J., The Cult of Saint Thecla: A Tradition of Women's Piety in Late Antiquity. (Oxford Early Christian Studies.)
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 2001, 8°, xiv-288 pp., 27 figg., 5 cartes. ISBN 0-19-827019-4. £55.
Focuses his attention specifically on the cult of Saint Thecla in Asia Minor and Egypt. Brings the evidence together in order to reconstruct the Egyptian cult of Saint Thecla.
